title: Super slow download speed.
body: For some reason when I got on my pc today my league client was gone, completely uninstalled. I went to go download it again and its downloading at a range of 500kb/s-200kb/s. Why is it like this? I've downloaded things on steam and they download at a perfect speed but not the league client. GG lol.

replies.body:
***UPDATE*** my download speed now sets around 90kb/s-10kb/s. Looks like I wont be playing league til the next season. 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Speeds can very and mean different things at different stages in the patching process. For example, during the first section of patching, you're primarily scanning files in your League directory so the patcher knows where to put new files or if you have any corrupt/missing files. I recommend just letting the patcher process run for a while on its own.

If you run into any errors during patching, let me know.
***UPDATE*** it's now at 96kb/s. Almost slower than {{champion:34}}  base movement speed. {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
